title: Reliance corners Rs 3,620 crore battery PLI sops
description: Reliance Industries Limited has secured Rs 3,620 crores in incentives for producing advanced chemistry cell batteries. This win adds to the 5 GWh capacity RIL had previously secured, bringing their total to 15 GWh. The incentives were awarded through a rebid by the Ministry of Heavy Industries.
